asset.author: skisdotcom
asset.hookText:
http://www.skis.com/Elan-Amphibio-82-Xti-Skis-with-ELX-12.0-Fusion-Bindings-2015/356586P,default,pd.html#.U5cT5F5bZ8M

The Amphibio 82 XTi is a great ski for advanced to expert skiers that are looking for a carving machine. If your perfect run is some freshly groomed corduroy with a steep pitch to it, this is your ski. Elan's Amphibio Rocker has camber on the inside edges for stability and power, with rocker on the inside edges to give you tons of maneuverability and quick turning you get one lightning fast ski. SST Sidewalls are slanted to give you strong edge hold on even the iciest conditions, but also help the 82 Xti drop some weight. The Force Wood Core with and XTi layer is very powerful, making it perfect for short to medium radius arcs down the front side. Elan's Waveflex Technology has waves across the top sheet of the ski to give it a natural flex, high torsional stiffness and make it the ultimate carving machine. If you want one of the most progressive carving skis on the market today grab yourself an Elan Amphibio 82 Xti today.
